verbose_text: Both BX795 and anti-IFNAR1antibody attenuated the antitumor activity of olaparib on PBM tumors, indicating that activation of the STING pathway and type I IFN responses are important for the antitumor activity of olaparib in Brca deficient tumors.
evidence: BX795 and anti-IFNAR1antibody attenuated the antitumor activity of olaparib on PBM tumors                                   , indicating that activation of the STING pathway and type I IFN responses are important for the antitumor activity of olaparib
